title: Everything you need to know about those .eth addresses on Twitter
content:
Welcome to TNW Basics, a collection of tips, guides, and advice on how to easily get the most out of your gadgets, apps, and other stuff. If you’ve been on Twitter recently, you’ll have seen people donning a username with a .eth suffix. You can see an example in the screengrab below. Ethereum address of co-founder of… Ethereum In this article, we’ll discuss what this .eth suffix means, and how you can get one and use it. Here we go! What the hell is a .eth domain? In a nutshell, it’s a domain name for your crypto wallet. It works just…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Twitter
description: What do those .eth domain names on Twitter mean? How can you get one? What's the use of that?
